name: Onism V.1
description:
- Final Project: This is the V.1 build of this game, a future iteration is actively being worked on and will be debuting in a few months -

Onism is a one-shot game that focuses upon the concept of a singular experience, in which your decisions set you on one linear pathway. 

Inspired by walking sim and text based adventures, you are able to choose between through worlds, each of which is host to its own story. Where will you go?

* Please note this game does save files to your computer. *
